'''''Amon Hen'' 211''' is the two-hundred-and-eleventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[May]] [[2008]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Gollum]]''
** By: Steve Lines
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* [[Bywater]] Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Announcements
* Seminar Announcement
* [[Oxonmoot]] Announcement
* Artwork: ''[[Niggle]]'s First Sight of the Tree''
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Report: Castles in the Mist Moreton-in-Marsh Exhibition
** By: Lynn Whitaker
* Report: [[Tolkien Reading Day]]
** By: "Tolkien Forever"
* Artwork: Untitled (from TRD flyer)
** By: Debbie Ann Hayes
* Report: AGM & Dinner 2008
** By: Carol Brownlow
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Artwork: ''[[Gandalf]]''
** By: Sue Wookey
* Ending the Dualism of Nature and Industry in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: S.J. Sprouse
* Artwork: ''[[:Image:Jef Murray - Seduction of Nienor.jpg|The Seduction of Nienor]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Call for Papers: Music in [[Middle-earth]]
* Heroic Failure and the will of God
** By: John Davis
* Artwork: ''He will try to take [[The One Ring|the Ring]]''
** By: [[Jill Thwaites]]
* Letters
* Tolkien and Sibelius
** By: [[John Ellison|John A. Ellison]]

** By: Anne Forbes
* Sally's Snippets
